MARKETSWIMMER FAIR VALUE ANALYSIS
==================================================

BASE CASE VALUATION:
Average Owner Earnings: $6,330,100,000
Discount Rate: 4.50%
Growth Rate: 2.0%
Enterprise Value: $130,073,669,391
Equity Value: $135,519,669,391
Fair Value per Share: $711.02


SCENARIO ANALYSIS:
    Scenario Growth Rate Discount Rate Terminal Multiple  Enterprise Value  Equity Value  Fair Value per Share
Conservative        0.0%          6.0%               12x      8.900642e+10  9.445242e+10            495.553118
   Base Case        2.0%          4.5%               15x      1.300737e+11  1.355197e+11            711.016104
  Optimistic        4.0%          4.0%               18x      1.772428e+11  1.826888e+11            958.493179
 Pessimistic       -1.0%          7.0%               10x      7.142323e+10  7.686923e+10            403.301323

METHODOLOGY:
1. Calculate 10-year average of Owner Earnings
2. Project future cash flows with growth assumptions
3. Discount to present value using 10-year Treasury rate
4. Add terminal value using earnings multiple
5. Adjust for net cash and debt
6. Calculate per-share fair value
